song.title: Tangu Kuamini
song.englishTitle: I have a Song I love to Sing

verses.verse: Ninao wimbo mzuri, Tangu kuamini; Wa Mkombozi, Mfalme, Tangu kuamini.
verses.refrain: Tangu kuamini, Jina lake tasifu, Tangu kuamini, Nitalisifu jina lake.
verses.verse: Kristo anitosha kweli, Tangu kuamini, Mapenzi yake napenda, Tangu kuamini.
Ninalo shuhuda sawa, Tangu kuamini; Linalofukuza shaka, Tangu kuamini.
Ninalo kao tayari, Tangu kuamini; Nililorithi kwa Yesu, Tangu kuamini.
